title: Condensed angular sans.
content:
Hi,

Please could someone ID this font or recommend some alternatives?

All the best  
R

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [376826589694\_jXokWSyo\_l.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/typophile.com/files/376826589694_jXokWSyo_l.jpg) | 74.49 KB |
author: rtgbanks

comments.content:
Hi, don't think this is an exact match but your font looks similar to United by House Industries, try 'United Sans Condensed Bold'.

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection")

Hi Matt,

Thanks for the recommendation. I was looking for something even more condensed.

Not matching either but here are some more, probably closest: [Uncle Sam](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/uncle-sam-slim-nf), [Chamfer Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/chamfer-gothic-rr), [Don't Mess With Vikings](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doubletwo/xxii-dont-mess-with-vikings), [Herald Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/herald-gothic), [Five Star Final](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/five-star-final), [CWM](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.playtype.com/font/cwm)  
Your best chance is probably to ask directly [Jonathan Zawada](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106042244/http:/www.zawada.com.au/).
